mapper.select: select d.timecode, to_char(starttime, 'HH24:MI') as starttime, to_char(endtime, 'HH24:MI') as endtime, d.moviedate, d.moviecount, d.screencode, d.moviecode from reserve_time d where starttime >= to_date(#{todate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:MI') and moviedate = to_date(#{todate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
